name: forge
description: FORGE - Comprehensive 10-phase development workflow with hooks, compound engineering agents, and Arkived integration. Initialize → Brainstorm → Research → Design → Plan → Test → Build → Validate → Review → Learn. Includes 12 specialized agents, debugging, Ralph Loop, security reviews, and lifecycle hooks.
